support.description: Supports skills which create Minions, causing those Minions to be unable to deal or take Damage. Cannot support skills which create undamageable Minions.

support.name: Burgeon I
support.description: Supports Channelling Skills you use yourself, causing them to deal more damage the longer they have been Channelled.

support.name: Burgeon II
support.description: Supports Channelling Skills you use yourself, causing them to deal more damage the longer they have been Channelled.

support.name: Burning Inscription
support.description: Supports any Skill which creates Runic Inscriptions when Cast, causing those Runic Inscriptions to trigger Burning Inscription when they expire. Burning Inscription is a Spell which creates Ignited Ground based off of your Maximum Mana.

support.name: Bursting Plague
support.description: Supports skills that can Poison enemies, causing Poisoned enemies to gain Plague over time and explode in a Plague Burst on death. Cannot support the skills of Minions.

support.name: Cadence
support.description: Supports Attacks you use yourself. Supported Skills gain more Attack speed each time you use them, but will become unusable if used too frequently in a short time frame.

support.name: Caltrops
support.description: Supports Ranged Spear Attacks. Supported Skills create Caltrops when Projectiles they create reach the end of their flight.

support.name: Cannibalism I
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to recover Life on kill while the Skill is active.

support.name: Cannibalism II
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to recover Life on kill while the Skill is active.

support.name: Catharsis
support.description: Supports any Skill you use yourself, causing supported Skill to detonate Volatility that is present on you. Supported Skill can only be used while you have a certain amount of Volatility and cannot support Skills which already have another Condition. Does not support Triggered Skills.

support.name: Chain I
support.description: Supports Projectile skills and any other skills that Chain, causing them to Chain additional times.

support.name: Chain II
support.description: Supports Projectile skills and any other skills that Chain, causing them to Chain additional times.

support.name: Chain III
support.description: Supports Projectile skills and any other skills that Chain, causing them to Chain additional times.

support.name: Chaos Attunement
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Gain Chaos Damage but deal less Damage of other Types.

support.name: Chaos Mastery
support.description: Supports Chaos skills, granting them an additional level. Does not support skills which do not have levels.

support.name: Chaotic Freeze
support.description: Supports Spells that deal non-Ailment Chaos damage over time. Enemies taking damage over time from Debuffs caused by supported skills will suffer Freeze build up from Chaos damage Hits from any source. Does not Support Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Charge Profusion I
support.description: Supports skills that can generate Charges, giving them a chance to generate an additional Charge when they do so.

support.name: Charge Profusion II
support.description: Supports skills that can generate Charges, giving them a chance to generate an additional Charge when they do so, as well as a chance to generate an additional Charge of a random type.

support.name: Charged Shots I
support.description: Supports Bow Attacks. Every third shot with Supported Skills restores a portion of it's Mana cost and Gains Damage as extra Lightning Damage.

support.name: Charged Shots II
support.description: Supports Bow Attacks. Every third shot with Supported Skills Gains Damage as extra Lightning Damage.

support.name: Clarity I
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain increased Mana Regeneration while the Skill is active.

support.name: Clarity II
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain increased Mana Regeneration while the Skill is active.

support.name: Clash
support.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills. Supported Skills deal more Damage while you have a lower percentage of your Life remaining than the target struck, but less Damage when the reverse is true.

support.name: Close Combat I
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more damage to enemies based on how close they are to you.

support.name: Close Combat II
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more damage to enemies based on how close they are to you.

support.name: Cold Attunement
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Gain Cold Damage but deal less Fire and Lightning Damage.

support.name: Cold Exposure
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to inflict Exposure when it Critically Hits an enemy.

support.name: Cold Mastery
support.description: Supports Cold skills, granting them an additional level. Does not support skills which do not have levels.

support.name: Cold Penetration
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making those Hits Penetrate enemy Cold resistance.

support.name: Combo Finisher I
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks you use yourself. Supported Skills cannot be used until enough Combo has been built up, but deal more damage. Cannot support skills which already Combo, or Triggered Skills.

support.name: Combo Finisher II
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks you use yourself. Supported Skills cannot be used until enough Combo has been built up, but deal massively more damage. Cannot support skills which already Combo, or Triggered Skills.

support.name: Commandment
support.description: Supports Minions which have Command Skills. Supported Minions have massively increased cooldown recovery speed for Command Skills they use, but deal no damage with non-Command Skills.

support.name: Commiserate
support.description: Supports Skills you use yourself or Trigger, which can cause Damaging Hits. Supported Skills inflict more powerful Ailments if you are afflicted with those Ailments when you inflict them, while also removing from you any Ailment that they inflict.

support.name: Compressed Duration I
support.description: Supports any skill that has a duration making that duration shorter.

support.name: Compressed Duration II
support.description: Supports any skill that has a duration making that duration shorter.

support.name: Concentrated Area
support.description: Supports any skill with an area of effect, causing that area to be smaller but any area damage it deals to be higher.

support.name: Concoct I
support.description: Supports Skills you use yourself which Damage enemies with Hits. Supported Skills consume a percentage of your maximum Life Flask charges, inflicting more powerful Bleeding based on Life Flask charges consumed.

support.name: Concoct II
support.description: Supports Skills you use yourself which Damage enemies with Hits. Supported Skills consume a percentage of your maximum Life Flask charges, inflicting more powerful Bleeding based on Life Flask charges consumed.

support.name: Considered Casting
support.description: Supports Spell Skills that Hit Enemies and you cast yourself, boosting Damage at the cost of Cast Speed.

support.name: Controlled Destruction
support.description: Supports Spells that Hit enemies, boosting their damage but preventing them from dealing Critical Hits.

support.name: Cool Headed
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing Ignite applied to you to last for a shorter duration while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Cooldown Recovery I
support.description: Supports skills with Cooldowns, increasing the rate at which those Cooldowns Recover. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

support.name: Cooldown Recovery II
support.description: Supports skills with Cooldowns, increasing the rate at which those Cooldowns Recover. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

support.name: Corpse Conservation
support.description: Supports skills that consume Corpses, giving them a chance to take effect without destroying the Corpse.

support.name: Corrosion
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing Poison it applies to also Break enemy Armour. Cannot support skills that Consume Fully Broken Armour.

support.name: Corrupting Cry I
support.description: Supports Warcries, causing them to inflict Corrupted Blood on enemies in their area of effect.

support.name: Corrupting Cry II
support.description: Supports Warcries, causing them to inflict Corrupted Blood on enemies in their area of effect.

support.name: Crackling Barrier
support.description: Supports Channelling Skills. While Channelling Supported Skills, you gain Lightning Thorns based off of your maximum Mana.

support.name: Crater
support.description: Supports Melee Skills that leap into the air, causing them to create Fissures when you land. Cannot Support Totem Skills, and does not modify Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Crazed Minions
support.description: Supports Minion Skills which summon Reviving Minions. Supported Minions deal significantly more Damage if they have Revived Recently.

support.name: Crescendo I
support.description: Supports Strikes that perform a Final Strike at the end of a combination of attacks, allowing you to use the Final Strike twice in succession.

support.name: Crescendo II
support.description: Supports Strikes that perform a Final Strike at the end of a combination of attacks, allowing you to use the Final Strike twice in succession, and causing Non-Final Strike Attacks to be faster.

support.name: Crescendo III
support.description: Supports Strikes that perform a Final Strike at the end of a combination of attacks, causing the Final Strike to be Ancestrally Boosted.

support.name: Crystalline Shards
support.description: Supports Skills which create Ice Crystals. Damaging Explosions caused by Ice Crystals from Supported Skills will Impale Enemies.

support.name: Culling Strike I
support.description: Supports Attack Skills, causing them to Cull Rare and Unique Enemies on Hit.

support.name: Culling Strike II
support.description: Supports Attack Skills, causing them to Cull Rare and Unique Enemies on Hit, and increasing the threshold at which they will Cull Enemies.

support.name: Culmination I
support.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills. Supported Skills gain Combo when you successfully Strike Enemies with other Melee Attacks. Supported Skills reset their Combo on use, dealing more Damage the higher Combo you had on use. Cannot support skills which already gain Combo. Does not modify Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Culmination II
support.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills. Supported Skills gain Combo when you successfully Strike Enemies with other Melee Attacks. Supported Skills reset their Combo on use, dealing more Damage the higher Combo you had on use. Cannot support skills which already gain Combo. Does not modify Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Cursed Ground
support.description: Supports Curse Skills. Supported Curse Skills create areas which Curse Enemies so long as they are within them.

support.name: Danse Macabre
support.description: Supports Offering Skills. Supported Skills have increased Buff effect and deal more damage, but will target an additional skeletal Minion when cast. If there is not an additional skeletal Minion to target, no damage or Buff effect will be granted.

support.name: Daresso's Passion
support.description: Supports Banner Skills, causing them to require significantly less Glory to use.

support.name: Dauntless
support.description: Supports Skills you use yourself which can cause Damaging Hits. Supported Skills cannot be used unless you have been stationary for a certain duration, but deal increasingly more damage the longer you are stationary. Cannot support Skills which have a reservation, are Triggered, have a cooldown or have another usage Condition.

support.name: Deadly Herald
support.description: Supports Herald Skills, making their triggered effects deal more damage at the expense of higher Spirit cost.

support.name: Deadly Poison I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal less damage but inflict more potent Poison.

support.name: Deadly Poison II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal less damage but inflict more potent Poison.

support.name: Deathmarch
support.description: Supports Skills which create Persistent Minions. Supported Minions will restore Life to nearby Allied Minions on death, as well as removing Ailments from those Minions.

support.name: Decaying Hex
support.description: Supports Curse skills. Cursed enemies' bodies decay, taking Chaos damage over time.

support.name: Deep Cuts I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal less damage but inflict more potent Bleeding.

support.name: Deep Cuts II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal less damage but inflict more potent Bleeding.

support.name: Deep Freeze
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing Freeze it inflicts to last longer.

support.name: Defy I
support.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself. Hit Damage from Supported Skills is Lucky if you are Surrounded.

support.name: Defy II
support.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself. Hit Damage from Supported Skills is Lucky and Insufficient Mana doesn't prevent Supported Skills from being used if you are Surrounded.

support.name: Delayed Gratification
support.description: Supports Skills which require some Condition to be met for use. Supported Skills can be used an additional time after their Condition has been met, but meeting that Condition is harder.

support.name: Delayed Reaction
support.description: Supports Skills which create Hazards, causing those Hazards to only be able to trigger immediately after creation or at the end of their duration. Created Hazards have significantly lowered duration, and deal more damage.

support.name: Deliberation
support.description: Supports skills that can be used while moving, causing you to move slower while using them, but granting more damage in exchange.

support.name: Derange
support.description: Supports Skills which you use yourself which can deal damage. Supported Skills gain an Energy Shield cost equal to your Intelligence, while also dealing more non-Ailment Damage over time based off of your Intelligence. Cannot support Channelling Skills.

support.name: Dialla's Desire
support.description: Supports any Skill which has levels, increasing the level and Quality, while reducing the cost and Reservation.

support.name: Direstrike I
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to deal increased Attack Damage while on Low Life while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Direstrike II
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to deal increased Attack Damage while on Low Life while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Doedre's Undoing
support.description: Supports Curse Skills. Supported Curse Skills create Hazardous areas which explode when Enemies enter them, Cursing Enemies and dealing Chaos Damage based on your Intelligence.

support.name: Double Barrel I
support.description: Supports Crossbow Ammunition Skills, causing them to load an extra bolt at the cost of reload speed.

support.name: Double Barrel II
support.description: Supports Crossbow Ammunition Skills, causing them to load an extra bolt at the cost of reload speed.

support.name: Double Barrel III
support.description: Supports Crossbow Ammunition Skills, causing them to load an extra bolt at the cost of reload speed. Supported Skills will also automatically reload when they Heavy Stun an enemy.

support.name: Drain Ailments
support.description: Supports Spells that deal non-Ailment damage over time, causing them to consume Ailments on enemies it applies damage over time Debuffs to in order to deal substantially more damage over time.

support.name: Durability
support.description: Supports Skills which create objects that are destroyed after being Hit a number of times, allowing for them to last for additional Hits. Does not modify Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Efficiency I
support.description: Supports any skill, making it cost less to use. Cannot support skills which reserve Spirit.

support.name: Efficiency II
support.description: Supports any skill, making it cost less to use. Cannot support skills which reserve Spirit.

support.name: Einhar's Beastrite
support.description: Supports Melee Strike skills, causing them to steal a Modifier from Rare monsters they kill for a lengthy duration, while being unable to damage enemies not on low Life. Does not modify skills used by Minions.

support.name: Electrocute
support.description: Supports any Skill which can deal Damage. Lightning Damage from Supported Skills can inflict Electrocute, but Supported Skills cannot inflict Shock.

support.name: Elemental Armament I
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more Elemental damage.

support.name: Elemental Armament II
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more Elemental damage.

support.name: Elemental Armament III
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more Damage for each Elemental Ailment on Enemies they Hit. Supported Skills cannot themselves inflict Elemental Ailments.

support.name: Elemental Army
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions, bolstering the Elemental Resistances of those Minions. Cannot support skills which create undamageable Minions.

support.name: Elemental Discharge
support.description: Supports any Spell that Hits enemies, causing it to consume Elemental Ailments on hit to trigger an Elemental Discharge. Cannot support the skills of Minions.

support.name: Elemental Focus
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal more Elemental Damage but be unable to inflict Elemental Ailments.

support.name: Embitter
support.description: Supports Skills which can Damage Enemies with Hits, causing all sources of Damage Gained to instead be treated as Damage Gained as extra Cold for Supported Skills.

support.name: Encroaching Ground
support.description: Supports Skills that create Ground Surfaces, causing those Surfaces to grow over time, up to a limit.

support.name: Enduring Impact I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, giving it a chance to gain an Endurance Charge when causing a Heavy Stun.

support.name: Enduring Impact II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, giving it a chance to gain an Endurance Charge when causing a Heavy Stun.

support.name: Energy Capacitor
support.description: Supports Invocation Skills which Trigger other Skills. Supported Skills have significantly higher Maximum Energy.

support.name: Energy Retention
support.description: Supports Meta Skills. Supported Skills gain a chance to partially Refund a portion of Energy cost when Triggering or Invoking other Skills.

support.name: Enraged Warcry I
support.description: Supports Warcries, causing them to expend Rage to bypass their usual Cooldown.

support.name: Enraged Warcry II
support.description: Supports Warcries, causing them to expend Rage to bypass their usual Cooldown.

support.name: Escalating Poison
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, allowing it to inflict an extra Poison on enemies but shortening the duration of those Poisons.

support.name: Esh's Radiance
support.description: Supports Skills that can cause Damaging Hits, granting extra Chaos damage and causing Chaos damage to Contribute to Shock.

support.name: Essence Harvest
support.description: Supports Skills which create Reviving Persistent Minions. When those Minions die, you Recoup a percentage of your maximum Mana.

support.name: Eternal Flame I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing its Ignites to be inflicted less often but last longer.

support.name: Eternal Flame II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing its Ignites to last longer.

support.name: Eternal Flame III
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to refresh Ignites on Critical Hit.

support.name: Excise
support.description: Supports any damaging Skill that you use yourself, granting it significantly higher chance to Critically Hit, but causing it to gain a long cooldown. Cannot support Skills which already have a cooldown.

support.name: Execrate
support.description: Supports any damaging Skill that you use yourself, granting it significantly higher chance to inflict Ailments on hit, but causing it to gain a long cooldown. Cannot support Skills which already have a cooldown.

support.name: Execute I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal more damage against enemies on Low Life.

support.name: Execute II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal more damage against enemies on Low Life.

support.name: Execute III
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal more damage against enemies on Low Life, as well as dealing more damage while you are on Low Life.

support.name: Expanse
support.description: Supports any Skill that you use yourself, granting it significantly higher Area of Effect but causing it to gain a long cooldown. Cannot support Skills which already have a cooldown.

support.name: Exploit Weakness
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing them to deal more Damage against enemies with Broken Armour but preventing them from Breaking Armour themselves. Cannot support skills that Consume Broken Armour.

support.name: Extraction
support.description: Supports Spell Skills which cause Damaging Hits. Using supported Spells will cause you to Sacrifice a portion of your Life on use, gaining extra Chaos Damage in exchange. Does not support Persistent Skills, Minion Skills, or Triggered Skills.

support.name: Feeding Frenzy I
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions, making them deal and take more damage. Cannot support skills which create undamageable Minions.

support.name: Feeding Frenzy II
support.description: FeedingFrenzySupportTwo

support.name: Ferocity
support.description: Supports Skills that you use yourself. Supported Skills will consume a Frenzy Charge on use if possible, and will gain significant Skill Speed if they do. Supported Skills cannot generate Frenzy Charges.

support.name: Fiery Death
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing enemies it Ignites to have a chance to explode on death.

support.name: Fire Attunement
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Gain Fire Damage but deal less Cold and Lightning Damage.

support.name: Fire Exposure
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to inflict Exposure when Igniting.

support.name: Fire Mastery
support.description: Supports Fire skills, granting them an additional level. Does not support skills which do not have levels.

support.name: Fire Penetration I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making those Hits Penetrate enemy Fire resistance.

support.name: Fire Penetration II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making those Hits ignore enemy Fire resistance.

support.name: Fist of War I
support.description: Supports Slams you use yourself, providing a powerful Ancestral Boost every few seconds.

support.name: Fist of War II
support.description: Supports Slams you use yourself, providing a powerful Ancestral Boost every few seconds.

support.name: Fist of War III
support.description: Supports Slams you use yourself, providing a very powerful Ancestral Boost infrequently.

support.name: Flamepierce
support.description: Supports Skills which can fire Projectiles. Initial Projectile created by Supported Skills will always Pierce Ignited Enemies, but Supported Skills cannot inflict Ignite themselves.

support.name: Fluke
support.description: Supports Skills which Trigger other Skills. Skills Triggered by Supported Skills have their Damage randomly raised or lowered when Triggered, as well as recovering a random amount of their cost when Triggered.

support.name: Focused Curse
support.description: Supports Curse skills, causing them to Curse enemies more quickly after being cast.

support.name: Font of Blood
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems. Totems created by supported Skills generate a Font of Blood which will Leech Life to Allies within it.

support.name: Font of Mana
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems. Totems created by supported Skills generate a Font of Mana which will Leech Mana to Allies within it.

support.name: Font of Rage
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems. Totems created by supported Skills generate a Font of Rage which will Leech Rage to Allies within it.

support.name: Fork
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making their Projectiles Fork.

support.name: Fortress I
support.description: Supports skills that create walls in a line, causing them to be created in a circle instead but deal less Hit damage.

support.name: Fortress II
support.description: Supports skills that create walls in a line, causing them to be created in a circle instead but deal less Hit damage and have lowered Area of Effect.

support.name: Freeze
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making it more effective at Freezing enemies.

support.name: Freezefork
support.description: Supports Skills which can fire Projectiles. Projectiles from Supported Skills always Fork when the initial Projectile Hits Frozen Enemies, but Supported Skills cannot build up Freeze themselves.

support.name: Frenzied Riposte
support.description: Supports Attacks you use yourself or that you Trigger, causing them to Consume the Parried Debuff on Hit to grant you a Frenzy Charge. Cannot support Skills which already Consume the Parried Debuff.

support.name: Fresh Clip I
support.description: Supports Crossbow Skills, granting them more damage for each bolt reloaded by that Skill in the last 6 seconds.

support.name: Fresh Clip II
support.description: Supports Crossbow Skills, granting them more damage for each bolt reloaded by that Skill in the last 8 seconds.

support.name: Frost Nexus
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to create patches of Chilled Ground around Frozen enemies.

support.name: Frostfire
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to Consume Freeze on Igniting a Frozen enemy to boost the effect of the Ignite.

support.name: Frozen Spite
support.description: Supports Attack Skills, causing them to create Ice Fragments on killing Frozen Enemies. Cannot Support Totem Skills and does not modify Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Gambleshot
support.description: Supports Skills which fire Projectiles that are not ground targeted. Projectiles from Supported Skills randomly Fork, Chain or Pierce.

support.name: Garukhan's Resolve
support.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself which do not already have some Condition for use. Supported Skills can only be used after you have moved a certain distance, but will Bifurcate Critical Hit Chance. Cannot support Skills which have a Cooldown or that are Triggered, and does not modify skills used by Minions.

support.name: Glacier
support.description: Supports any Skill which creates Ice Crystals, causing them to be created with higher Life.

support.name: Greatwood I
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems, limiting their active Totem count to one but granting significant benefits for supported Totems based on what their Totem Limit would have been without this restriction. Does not Support Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Greatwood II
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems, limiting their active Totem count to one but granting significant benefits for supported Totems based on what their Totem Limit would have been without this restriction. Does not Support Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Haemocrystals
support.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself which can cause Damaging Hits. Supported Skills Consume Bleeding on Hit to create explosive blood-filled crystals, but cannot themselves inflict Bleeding. Cannot Support Skills which already Consume Bleeding.

support.name: Hardy Totems I
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems, causing those Totems to have more Life.

support.name: Hardy Totems II
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems, causing those Totems to have more Life.

support.name: Harmonic Remnants I
support.description: Supports Skills which create Remnants, allowing those Remnants to be collected from further away.

support.name: Harmonic Remnants II
support.description: Supports Skills which create Remnants, allowing those Remnants to be collected from further away, with a chance to create an additional Remnant.

support.name: Heavy Swing
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks, boosting their Physical damage at the cost of Attack Speed.

support.name: Heft
support.description: Supports Skills which deal Damage, increasing the maximum Physical Damage of their Hits.

support.name: Heightened Accuracy I
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to gain Accuracy.

support.name: Heightened Accuracy II
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to gain Accuracy, and never miss against Enemies on full Life.

support.name: Heightened Charges
support.description: Supports any Skill that Consumes Charges, granting a chance for benefits of that Consumption to be doubled.

support.name: Heightened Curse
support.description: Supports Curse Skills, magnifying their power.

support.name: Herbalism I
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain increased Life recovery from Flasks while the Skill is active.

support.name: Herbalism II
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain increased Life recovery from Flasks while the Skill is active.

support.name: Hex Bloom
support.description: Supports Curses, spreading their effects when a Cursed enemy dies.

support.name: Hit and Run
support.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself which do not already have some Condition for use. Supported Skills can only be used after you have moved a certain distance, but have massively increased Skill Speed. Cannot support Skills which have a Cooldown or that are Triggered, and does not modify skills used by Minions.

support.name: Holy Descent
support.description: Supports Skills that leap into the air, causing them to create Consecrated Ground when you land

support.name: Hourglass
support.description: Supports any damaging skill that you use yourself, causing it to deal significantly more damage but gain a long cooldown. Cannot support Skills which already have a cooldown.

support.name: Hulking Minions
support.description: Supports Skills which summon Persistent Minions. Supported Minions are larger, have more Life, and deal more Damage, but cost significantly more Spirit.

support.name: Ice Bite
support.description: Supports Attacks you use yourself. Freezing an enemy with supported skills infuses all of your Attacks with Cold damage for a short time.

support.name: Icicle
support.description: Supports any Skill which creates Ice Crystals, causing them to be created with lower Life.

support.name: Ignite I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making it more likely to Ignite.

support.name: Ignite II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making it more likely to Ignite.

support.name: Ignite III
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making it more likely to Ignite and causing inflicted Ignites to deal their damage more quickly.

support.name: Immolate
support.description: Supports Attacks, granting them extra Fire damage against Ignited enemies but making them unable to Ignite enemies themselves.

support.name: Impact Shockwave
support.description: Supports Melee Strike skills, causing them to create an Aftershock that damages enemies around the target when they Heavy Stun an enemy.

support.name: Impale
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Impale on Hit but making them unable to Extract Impale themselves.

support.name: Impending Doom
support.description: Supports Curse skills you cast yourself, causing them to trigger Doom Blast on Cursed enemies when the Curse expires.

support.name: Incision
support.description: Supports Attack Skills. Supported Skills inflict Incision on Hit, which causes Enemies to be increasingly more likely to be inflicted with Bleeding. All Incision is removed from a target on inflicting it with Bleeding.

support.name: Inevitable Critical
support.description: Supports any skill you use yourself that Hits enemies, causing it to accumulate Critical Hit chance over time.

support.name: Infernal Legion I
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions which can be damaged, causing them and enemies near them to Burn. Damage dealt by the Burning is based off the Life of the supported Minion.

support.name: Infernal Legion II
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions which can be damaged, causing them and enemies near them to Burn. Damage dealt by the Burning is based off the Life of the supported Minion.

support.name: Infernal Legion III
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions which can be damaged, causing them and enemies near them to Burn. Damage dealt by the Burning is based off the Life of the supported Minion.

support.name: Inhibitor
support.description: Supports any Skill you use yourself or that you Trigger. Supported Skills cannot consume Charges or Infusion by any means. Cannot Support Skills which require Charges or Infusion to be used.

support.name: Innervate
support.description: Supports Attacks you use yourself. Killing a Shocked enemy with supported skills infuses all of your Attacks with Lightning damage for a short time.

support.name: Intense Agony
support.description: Supports Spells that deal non-Ailment damage over time, causing them to have a shorter duration but deal substantially more damage over time with Debuffs inflicted against enemies on full life.

support.name: Ixchel's Torment
support.description: Supports Skills which Trigger other Skills. Skills Triggered by Supported Skills have their Damage, Area of Effect, and Projectile Speed randomly raised or lowered when Triggered, as well as recovering a random amount of their cost when Triggered.

support.name: Jagged Ground I
support.description: Supports Slam skills. Supported Skills will consume Endurance Charges on use to create Jagged Ground.

support.name: Jagged Ground II
support.description: Supports Slam skills. Aftershocks caused by Supported Slam Skills always create patches of Jagged Ground.

support.name: Kalisa's Crescendo
support.description: Supports Curse Skills. Enemies Cursed by Supported Skills are Pacified for the final portion of the Supported Curse's duration.

support.name: Kaom's Madness
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks which create fissures in the ground, causing them to create many additional fissures at the cost of damage, attack speed, and area of effect.

support.name: Knockback
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to Knock Back enemies.

support.name: Kulemak's Dominion
support.description: Supports Offering Skills, causing Spells that affect an area around you or a target location to also affect the area around Supported Offerings.

support.name: Kurgal's Leash
support.description: Supports Commandable Minions causing you and the Supported Minion to gain Unholy Might when you Command them.

support.name: Last Gasp
support.description: Supports skills that create Persistent Minions, causing those Minions to fight on when they are fatally wounded, dying after a short duration or when they take further damage exceeding their maximum Life.

support.name: Lasting Shock
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies or inflicts Shock, causing its Shocks to be inflicted less often but last longer.

support.name: Life Bounty
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing enemies it kills to grant more Life Flask charges.

support.name: Life Drain
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing you to recover Life when it Culls an enemy.

support.name: Life Leech I
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing their Physical damage to Leech Life.

support.name: Life Leech II
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing their Physical damage to Leech Life.

support.name: Life Leech III
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing their Physical damage to Leech Life and preventing Leech gained this way from being removed at full Life.

support.name: Lifetap
support.description: Supports any Skill, turning its Mana cost into a Life cost. Does not support Skills which reserve Spirit.

support.name: Lightning Attunement
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Gain Lightning Damage but deal less Cold and Fire Damage.

support.name: Lightning Exposure
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to inflict Exposure when inflicting Shock.

support.name: Lightning Mastery
support.description: Supports Lightning skills, granting them an additional level. Does not support skills which do not have levels.

support.name: Lightning Penetration
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making those Hits Penetrate enemy Lightning resistance.

support.name: Living Lightning
support.description: Supports Skills which cause Damaging Hits. Living Lightning Minions are created when dealing Lightning damage with Supported Skills - bundles of living electricity that target nearby enemies with Chaining Attacks. Enemies will not directly engage these Minions, and can pass through them. Does not modify skills used by Minions.

support.name: Living Lightning II
support.description: Supports Skills which cause Damaging Hits. Living Lightning Minions are created when dealing Lightning damage with Supported Skills - bundles of living electricity that target nearby enemies with Chaining Attacks. Enemies will not directly engage these Minions, and can pass through them. Does not modify skills used by Minions.

support.name: Lockdown
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing any Pin buildup it inflicts to be stronger the closer the enemy is to you.

support.name: Long Fuse I
support.description: Supports Skills which have a Detonation Time, causing those Skills to have much higher Detonation Time and detonation damage.

support.name: Long Fuse II
support.description: Supports Skills which have a Detonation Time, causing those Skills to have much higher Detonation Time and detonation damage.

support.name: Longshot I
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more damage from farther away.

support.name: Longshot II
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to deal more damage from farther away.

support.name: Loyalty
support.description: Supports Skills that create Companions which can be damaged. Minions created by Supported Skills take a portion of Hit Damage you would otherwise have taken, but have lowered maximum Life.

support.name: Magnified Area I
support.description: Supports any skill with an area of effect, making it larger.

support.name: Magnified Area II
support.description: Supports any skill with an area of effect, making it larger at the cost of damage.

support.name: Maim
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Maim enemies.

support.name: Malady
support.description: Supports Skills which can cause Damaging Hits, causing base chance to inflict Bleed with Supported Skills to instead apply to base chance to Poison, and causing base chance to Poison to instead apply to Bleed.

support.name: Mana Bounty
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing enemies it kills to grant more Mana Flask charges.

support.name: Mana Flare
support.description: Supports any Spell that Hits enemies, causing it to trigger a Mana Flare on Critical Hit. The Mana Flare consumes your Mana to deal Fire damage. Cannot support the skills of Minions.

support.name: Mana Leech
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing their Physical damage to Leech Mana.

support.name: Mark for Death
support.description: Supports Mark Skills. Enemies affected by Supported Marks will have their Armour Broken by Physical Damage they take.

support.name: Meat Shield I
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions, granting them less damage taken but making them deal less damage. Cannot support skills which create undamageable Minions.

support.name: Meat Shield II
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions, granting them less damage taken but making them deal less damage.

support.name: Minion Instability
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions, causing them to violently explode when reduced to Low Life.

support.name: Minion Mastery
support.description: Supports Minion skills, granting them an additional level. Does not support skills which do not have levels.

support.name: Minion Pact I
support.description: Supports damaging skills you use yourself, draining the life from one of your Minions on use in order to boost the skill's damage. Only takes effect if you have a Minion with enough life to drain the full amount.

support.name: Minion Pact II
support.description: Supports damaging skills you use yourself, draining the life from one of your Minions on use in order to boost the skill's damage. Only takes effect if you have a Minion with enough life to drain the full amount.

support.name: Mobility
support.description: Supports skills that can be used while moving, allowing you to move faster while using them.

support.name: Momentum
support.description: Supports any damaging skill that you use yourself, causing it to deal more damage if you move a sufficient distance while using the skill. Teleportation does not count towards the distance travelled.

support.name: Multishot I
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making them fire extra Projectiles. Also lowers Attack and Cast speed of supported skills, as well as lessening their damage.

support.name: Multishot II
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making them fire extra Projectiles. Also lowers Attack and Cast speed of supported skills, as well as lessening their damage.

support.name: Murderous Intent
support.description: Supports skills that can Empower skills other than themselves, causing skills they Empower to Cull enemies.

support.name: Muster
support.description: Supports Skills which summon Minions. Supported Minions deal more Damage the more different kinds of Reviving Minions you have summoned.

support.name: Mysticism I
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to deal increased Spell Damage while on full Energy Shield while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Mysticism II
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to deal increased Spell Damage while on full Energy Shield while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Neural Overload
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies. Nearby enemies are marked when they are Primed for Electrocution, and hitting a marked enemy with a supported skill will Electrocute them.

support.name: Nimble Reload
support.description: Supports Crossbow Ammunition Skills, causing them to Reload bolts significantly faster.

support.name: Nova Projectiles
support.description: Supports Projectile Skills, making them fire extra Projectiles in a circle, at the cost of Damage. Does not support Skills which rain down Projectiles from above.

support.name: Overabundance I
support.description: Supports skills which can have a Limited number of effects active at once, increasing that Limit at the cost of their duration. Only applies to restrictions that use the word "Limit".

support.name: Overabundance II
support.description: Supports skills which can have a Limited number of effects active at once, increasing that Limit at the cost of their duration. Only applies to restrictions that use the word "Limit".

support.name: Overabundance III
support.description: Supports skills which can have a Limited number of effects active at once, doubling that Limit at the cost of Cursing yourself on Skill use. Only applies to restrictions that use the word "Limit".

support.name: Overcharge
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making its Shocks more effective but reflecting them back to you as well.

support.name: Overextend
support.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills deal more Damage with Critical Hits, but Critically Hitting an Enemy with them will Daze you for a short time.

support.name: Overreach
support.description: Supports Attack Skills which deal Damage in an Area. Supported Skills have significantly increased Area of Effect, but are less Accurate against nearby targets.

support.name: Paquate's Pact
support.description: Supports Warcries, causing them to inflict massive amounts of Corrupted Blood on enemies in their area of effect, at the cost of your Life.

support.name: Payload
support.description: Supports Skills which fire Grenades, giving fired Grenades a chance to activate again, but lengthening their cooldowns.

support.name: Perfected Endurance
support.description: Supports skills which have a benefit for Perfect Timing. Supported Skills grant at least one Endurance Charge when Hitting an enemy with Perfect Timing.

support.name: Perfection
support.description: Supports skills which have a benefit for Perfectly Timing their use. On successfully executing Perfect Timing with Supported Skills, gain Perfection, which is a powerful damage buff. However, failing to execute any Perfect Timing (even with skills not supported by Perfection) will remove all Perfection on you.

support.name: Perpetual Charge
support.description: Supports skills that consume Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charges on use, giving them a chance not to remove each Charge while still gaining the benefits of consuming them.

support.name: Persistent Ground I
support.description: Supports Skills which create Ground Surfaces, causing created Surfaces to last much longer.

support.name: Persistent Ground II
support.description: Supports Skills which create Ground Surfaces, causing created Surfaces to last much longer and only end when their duration expires.

support.name: Persistent Ground III
support.description: Supports Skills which create Ground Surfaces, causing created Surfaces to last much longer as well as lowering the Cooldown Recovery Speed of affected Enemies. Ground Surfaces from Supported Skills only end when their duration expires.

support.name: Physical Mastery
support.description: Supports Physical skills, granting them an additional level. Does not support skills which do not have levels.

support.name: Pierce I
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making their Projectiles Pierce an enemy but deal less damage after doing so.

support.name: Pierce II
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making their Projectiles Pierce an enemy.

support.name: Pierce III
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making their Projectiles Pierce an unlimited number of enemies, losing damage as they do so.

support.name: Piety's Mercy
support.description: Supports Skills that cause Damaging Hits. Hits from Supported Skills cannot kill Enemies.

support.name: Pin I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, allowing its Physical damage to Pin enemies but making it unable to Stun.

support.name: Pin II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, allowing its Physical damage to Pin enemies but making it unable to Stun, as well as granting Critial Hit Chance against Immobilised enemies.

support.name: Pin III
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, allowing its Physical damage to Pin enemies but making it unable to Stun. Pin buildup caused by Supported Skill is lessened, but Pin duration is significantly longer.

support.name: Pinpoint Critical
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits Enemies, causing it to Critically Hit more often but deal less damage with Critical Hits.

support.name: Poison I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, giving it a chance to Poison enemies.

support.name: Poison II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, giving it a chance to Poison enemies.

support.name: Poison III
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, giving it a chance to Poison enemies and causing it to inflict more powerful Poisons against Bleeding Enemies.

support.name: Potent Exposure
support.description: Supports Skills which apply Exposure to Enemies, increasing the effect of applied Exposure.

support.name: Practiced Combo
support.description: Supports Strike Skills. Supported Skills have a chance to build additional Combo on Hit. Cannot support Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Precision I
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain increased Accuracy while the Skill is active.

support.name: Precision II
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain increased Accuracy while the Skill is active.

support.name: Profanity I
support.description: Supports Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills consume a Corpse on use, dealing more Chaos Damage if they do. Cannot support Triggered Skills or Reservation Skills.

support.name: Profanity II
support.description: Supports Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills consume many Corpses on use, dealing more Chaos Damage per Corpse consumed. Cannot support Triggered Skills or Reservation Skills.

support.name: Projectile Acceleration I
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making those Projectiles travel faster.

support.name: Projectile Acceleration II
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making those Projectiles travel faster, and granting them a chance to Pierce Enemies.

support.name: Projectile Acceleration III
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making those Projectiles travel faster, and causing increases and reductions to Projectile speed to also apply to Damage.

support.name: Projectile Deceleration I
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making those Projectiles travel more slowly.

support.name: Projectile Deceleration II
support.description: Supports Projectile skills, making those Projectiles travel more slowly.

support.name: Prolonged Duration I
support.description: Supports any skill that has a duration, making that duration longer.

support.name: Prolonged Duration II
support.description: Supports any skill that has a duration, making that duration longer.

support.name: Punch Through
support.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills. Supported Skills apply Easy Target when Knocking Back Enemies, causing the next Projectile Attack Hit they take to deal increased Damage.

support.name: Pursuit I
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks. Supported Skills deal more Melee damage if you have struck with a Projectile Attack Hit in the last eight seconds, but cannot themselves deal Projectile Damage.

support.name: Pursuit II
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks. Supported Skills deal more Melee damage if you have struck with a Projectile Attack Hit in the last eight seconds, but cannot themselves deal Projectile Damage.

support.name: Pursuit III
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks. Supported Skills deal more Melee damage if you have struck with a Projectile Attack Hit in the last two seconds, but cannot themselves deal Projectile Damage.

support.name: Quill Burst
support.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills. Supported Skills trigger Quill Burst, which deals your Thorns Damage in an Area around the target struck. Quill Burst can only be triggered on Hit after you've Retaliated with Thorns Damage.

support.name: Rage I
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks, causing them to grant Rage on Hit.

support.name: Rage II
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks, causing them to grant Rage on Hit.

support.name: Rage III
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks, causing them to grant Rage on Hit. Supported Skills have signficantly higher Attack speed while you are not at maximum Rage.

support.name: Rageforged I
support.description: Supports any damaging skill that you use or trigger yourself, causing it to consume Rage to deal more damage. If you don't have enough Rage to consume, the damage bonus will not apply.

support.name: Rageforged II
support.description: Supports any damaging skill that you use or trigger yourself, causing it to consume Rage to deal more damage, with a chance to skip consuming Rage while still benefitting as though it had. If you don't have enough Rage to consume, the damage bonus will not apply.

support.name: Raging Cry
support.description: Supports Warcry skills, causing them to grant you Rage on use depending on counted monster Power.

support.name: Rakiata's Flow
support.description: Supports Skills that can cause Damaging Hits, causing those Hits to treat Enemy Elemental Resistances as inverted.

support.name: Rapid Attacks I
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Attack faster.

support.name: Rapid Attacks II
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Attack faster.

support.name: Rapid Attacks III
support.description: Supports Attacks, causing them to Attack faster at the cost of Damage.

support.name: Rapid Casting I
support.description: Supports Spells, causing them to cast faster.

support.name: Rapid Casting II
support.description: Supports Spells, causing them to cast faster.

support.name: Rapid Casting III
support.description: Supports Spells, causing them to cast faster for each different Spell you've cast Recently.

support.name: Ratha's Assault
support.description: Supports Crossbow Ammunition Skills, causing them to load multiple extra bolts. Supported Skills cannot reload normally, instead loading bolts when you Dodge.

support.name: Rearm I
support.description: Supports Skills which create Hazards. Hazards created by Supported Skills have a chance to be rearmed a short duration after triggering.

support.name: Rearm II
support.description: Supports Skills which create Hazards. Hazards created by Supported Skills have a chance to be rearmed a short duration after triggering.

support.name: Refraction I
support.description: Supports Banner Skills, causing those affected by Auras they create to gain Refractive Plating, a Buff which causes Armour to partially apply to Elemental Hit Damage.

support.name: Refraction II
support.description: Supports Banner Skills, causing those affected by Auras they create to gain Refractive Plating, a Buff which causes Armour to partially apply to Elemental Hit Damage.

support.name: Refraction III
support.description: Supports Banner Skills, causing Enemies within their area to gain Refractive Dissolution, a Debuff which lowers Elemental Resistances.

support.name: Reinforced Totems I
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems. Totems created by Supported Skills have additional Elemental Resistances.

support.name: Reinforced Totems II
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems. Totems created by Supported Skills have additional Elemental Resistances.

support.name: Remnant Potency I
support.description: Supports Skills which create Remnants, making those Remnants more powerful.

support.name: Remnant Potency II
support.description: Supports Skills which create Remnants, making those Remnants more powerful, but delaying their effect.

support.name: Remnant Potency III
support.description: Supports Skills which create Remnants, making those Remnants more powerful, but delaying their effect.

support.name: Retaliate I
support.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills gain much more damage the closer you are to being Heavily Stunned.

support.name: Retaliate II
support.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills gain much more damage and are more capable of Stunning Enemies the closer you are to being Heavily Stunned.

support.name: Retreat I
support.description: Supports Skills which create Projectiles. Supported Skills deal more damage with Projectiles if you have struck with a Melee Hit in the last eight seconds, but cannot themselves deal Melee Damage.

support.name: Retreat II
support.description: Supports Skills which create Projectiles. Supported Skills deal more damage with Projectiles if you have struck with a Melee Hit in the last eight seconds, but cannot themselves deal Melee Damage.

support.name: Retreat III
support.description: Supports Skills which create Projectiles. Supported Skills deal more damage with Projectiles if you have struck with a Melee Hit in the last two seconds, but cannot themselves deal Melee Damage.

support.name: Ricochet I
support.description: Supports any Skill which creates Projectiles, giving those Projectiles a chance to Chain when impacting terrain.

support.name: Ricochet II
support.description: Supports any Skill which creates Projectiles, giving those Projectiles a chance to Chain when impacting terrain.

support.name: Ricochet III
support.description: Supports any Skill which creates Projectiles, causing those Projectiles to Chain when impacting terrain, at the cost of any additional Projectiles, as well as causing them to always Pierce.

support.name: Rigwald's Ferocity
support.description: Supports Attack skills, granting them Attack Speed at the cost of Damage or Damage at the cost of Attack Speed depending on Weapon Set they are used in. Does not modify skills used by Minions.

support.name: Rip
support.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills you use yourself or that you Trigger. Killing Blows with Supported Skills on Bleeding enemies create a Blood Remnant. Blood Remnants increase your Life regeneration rate for a short while after being collected.

support.name: Rising Tempest
support.description: Supports Skills which deal Damage, raising Elemental Damage dealt for each Skill used Recently of a different Elemental type. Cannot support Minion Skills.

support.name: Ritualistic Curse
support.description: Supports Curse skills, causing them to cover a larger area but take longer to Curse enemies.

support.name: Romira's Requital
support.description: Supports Skills that create Companions which can be damaged. Minions created by Supported Skills take a portion of Hit Damage you would otherwise have taken, but have lowered maximum Life. A percentage of Damage taken this way is Recouped by you as [Life].

support.name: Rupture
support.description: Supports skills that Hit Enemies. Supported skills Aggravate Bleeding on Hitting Heavily Stunned Enemies.

support.name: Rusted Spikes
support.description: Supports Skills which deal Damage with Hits. When Supported Skills Pin an Enemy, they also Aggravate Bleeding on that Enemy.

support.name: Sacrificial Lamb I
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions, causing your skills which can target Minions to prioritise targeting Minions from the Supported Skill.

support.name: Sacrificial Lamb II
support.description: Supports skills which create Minions, causing your skills which can target Minions to prioritise targeting Minions from the Supported Skill, as well as causing them to always be considered Detonatable.

support.name: Sacrificial Offering
support.description: Supports Offering Skills. Supported Skills Sacrifice a portion of your life on use, but deal much more damage and have more powerful Buffs in return.

support.name: Salvo
support.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself which fire Projectiles. Supported Skills accumulate Seals over time, and consume them when used. For each Seal consumed, the Attack will fire additional Projectiles. Projectiles from Supported Skills are fired in random directions. Cannot Support Skills which require Combo, have a Cooldown or already gain Seals.

support.name: Searing Flame I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing inflicted Ignites to deal more damage but its Hits to deal less damage.

support.name: Searing Flame II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing inflicted Ignites to deal more damage but its Hits to deal less damage.

support.name: Second Wind I
support.description: Supports skills with cooldowns, giving them extra uses of that cooldown. Cannot support instant or triggered skills, or modify the skills of minions.

support.name: Second Wind II
support.description: Supports skills with cooldowns, giving them extra uses of that cooldown. Cannot support instant or triggered skills, or modify the skills of minions.

support.name: Second Wind III
support.description: Supports skills with cooldowns, giving them extra uses of that cooldown and causing them to restore Life on use. Cannot support instant or triggered skills, or modify the skills of minions.

support.name: Selfless Remnants
support.description: Supports Skills that generate Remnants, causing those Remnants to affect Allies in your Presence when collected instead of you.

support.name: Shock
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, making it more likely to Shock.

support.name: Shock Conduction
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, giving it a chance to also Shock nearby enemies when you Shock an enemy.

support.name: Shock Siphon
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing you to recover Energy Shield when it kills a Shocked enemy.

support.name: Shocking Leap
support.description: Supports Skills that leap into the air and deal damage, causing them to create Shocked Ground the first time they Critically Hit an enemy.

support.name: Short Fuse I
support.description: Supports Skills which Detonate after some amount of time has elapsed, shortening the time before Detonation.

support.name: Short Fuse II
support.description: Supports Skills which Detonate after some amount of time has elapsed, massively shortening the time before Detonation at the cost of Damage.

support.name: Sione's Temper
support.description: Supports Projectile Spells. Supported Spells have an increasingly higher chance to fire many additional Projectiles in a circle, resetting when they do.

support.name: Skittering Stone I
support.description: Supports Skills which create shatterable earthen objects. After killing enough Enemies in range of these objects, they will shatter, releasing skittering stone Minions.

support.name: Skittering Stone II
support.description: Supports Skills which create shatterable earthen objects. After killing enough Enemies in range of these objects, they will shatter, releasing skittering stone Minions.

support.name: Slow Potency
support.description: Supports any skill, causing inflicted Slows to be more powerful.

support.name: Soul Drain
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing you to recover Mana when it Culls an enemy.

support.name: Spar
support.description: Supports Melee Attack Skills. Supported Skills are more capable of Stunning Enemies the closer you are to being Heavily Stunned.

support.name: Spectral Volley
support.description: Supports Bow or Spear Projectile Attacks you use yourself. Supported Skills deal lower damage initially, but generate Spectral Projectiles, which deal more damage when they fire. Spectral Projectiles linger and will fire a short duration after no new Spectral Projectiles have been created. Cannot support Channelling Skills, Leaping skills, or skills which rain Projectiles from above.

support.name: Spell Cascade
support.description: Supports Spells that affect an area around you or a target location, causing those Spells to also target additional areas on either side of the target area, along a randomly chosen axis. Cannot support Channelling skills or Remote skills.

support.name: Spell Echo
support.description: Supports Spells that affect an area around you or a target location. Supported Spells echo, causing their effects to happen again after a short delay. Cannot support Channelling skills Remote skills or skills which are Triggered.

support.name: Steadfast I
support.description: Supports Channelling Skills you use yourself, granting you higher Stun Threshold while Channelling them.

support.name: Steadfast II
support.description: Supports Channelling Skills you use yourself, granting you higher Stun Threshold and Ailment Threshold while Channelling them.

support.name: Stoicism I
support.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills steadily gain more Damage, up to a cap. This Damage bonus is reset if you Dodge Roll or use a Travel Skill.

support.name: Stoicism II
support.description: Supports Attack Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills steadily gain more Damage, up to a cap. This Damage bonus is reset if you Dodge Roll or use a Travel Skill.

support.name: Stomping Ground
support.description: Supports Travel skills, causing your footsteps to crack the earth and emit damaging shockwaves while using the skill.

support.name: Stormchain
support.description: Supports Projectile Skills and Skills which can Chain. Supported Skills always Chain when initially Hitting a Shocked Enemy, but cannot themselves inflict Shock. Does not support Skills which cannot Chain.

support.name: Stormfire
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, prolonging Shocks they inflict on Ignited enemies.

support.name: Streamlined Rounds
support.description: Supports Crossbow Ammunition Skills. Supported Skills have significantly higher Attack speed and bolt capacity, but deal less damage and have longer reload time.

support.name: Strong Hearted
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing Shock applied to you to last for a shorter duration while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Stun I
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits Enemies, causing it to build up Stun more quickly.

support.name: Stun II
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits Enemies, causing it to build up Stun more quickly.

support.name: Stun III
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits Enemies, causing it to build up Stun significantly more quickly, at the cost of Damage.

support.name: Supercritical
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, causing it to deal more damage with Critical Hits but have less Critical Hit chance.

support.name: Swift Affliction I
support.description: Supports any skill that deals damage, causing it to deal more non-Ailment damage over time but have a shorter duration.

support.name: Swift Affliction II
support.description: Supports any skill that deals damage, causing it to deal more non-Ailment damage over time but have a shorter duration.

support.name: Swift Affliction III
support.description: Supports any skill that deals damage, causing effects with a duration of one second or less to deal more non-Ailment damage over time.

support.name: Syzygy
support.description: Supports Slam Skills you use yourself. Hits from Supported Skills are considered Crushing Blows against Enemies which are both Ignited and Fully Armour Broken. Hits with Supported Skills that Heavily Stun Ignited and Fully Armour Broken Enemies will Intimidate them.

support.name: Tacati's Ire
support.description: Supports Skills which can cause Damaging Hits. Poison inflicted with Supported Skills deals Damage faster the higher your Rage.

support.name: Tawhoa's Tending
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems, causing those Totems to have more Life. Totems created by Supported Skills explode on death, dealing Physical damage based on their Life.

support.name: Tear
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks you use yourself or that you Trigger. On-Kill effects caused by Killing Blows with Supported Skills on Bleeding enemies have a chance to occur twice.

support.name: Tecrod's Revenge
support.description: Supports skills that create Persistent Minions, causing those Minions to fight on when they are fatally wounded, dying after a short duration or when they take further damage exceeding their maximum Life. Minions from Supported Skills gain Soul Eater and a burst of speed on entering this state.

support.name: Thornskin I
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to deal increased Thorns Damage while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Thornskin II
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to deal increased Thorns Damage while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Tireless
support.description: Supports Warcry Skills. Attacks Empowered by Supported Skills have a chance not to lower the Empowerment count of Supported Skills when they are used.

support.name: Tul's Stillness
support.description: Supports Skills that can cause Damaging Hits, granting extra Chaos damage and causing Chaos damage to Contribute to Freeze Buildup.

support.name: Uhtred's Augury
support.description: Supports Skills which can gain levels, granting them many additional levels provided exactly two other supports are used with the supported Skill. Does not support skills which do not have levels.

support.name: Uhtred's Exodus
support.description: Supports Skills which can gain levels, granting them many additional levels provided no other supports are used with the supported Skill. Does not support skills which do not have levels.

support.name: Uhtred's Omen
support.description: Supports Skills which can gain levels, granting them many additional levels provided exactly one other support is used with the supported Skill. Does not support skills which do not have levels.

support.name: Unleash
support.description: Supports Spells you cast yourself, making their effect reoccur when cast. Cannot support Channelling Skills or Skills with a Cooldown.

support.name: Upheaval I
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks which create fissures in the ground, causing them to create an additional fissure at the cost of damage and attack speed.

support.name: Upheaval II
support.description: Supports Melee Attacks which create fissures in the ground, causing them to create additional fissures at the cost of damage and attack speed.

support.name: Upwelling I
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing your Minions to deal increased Damage while you are not on full Mana while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Upwelling II
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing your Minions to deal increased Damage while you are not on full Mana while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Urgent Totems I
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems, causing those Skills to place Totems much more quickly.

support.name: Urgent Totems II
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems, causing those Skills to place Totems much more quickly.

support.name: Urgent Totems III
support.description: Supports Skills which create Totems, causing those Skills to place Totems much more quickly. Totems created by Supported Skills have increased Attack and Cast Speed.

support.name: Uruk's Smelting
support.description: Supports any skill, causing Armour Break it inflicts to be stronger. Fully Breaking Armour with Supported Skills permanently increases the Physical Damage taken by those affected, up to a cap.

support.name: Uul-Netol's Embrace
support.description: Supports Skills that can cause Damaging Hits, granting extra Chaos damage and causing Chaos damage to Break Armour.

support.name: Vanguard I
support.description: Supports Shield Skills, causing you to gain Guard on Stunning Enemies with the Supported Skill.

support.name: Vanguard II
support.description: Supports Shield Skills, causing you to gain Guard on Stunning Enemies with the Supported Skill.

support.name: Varashta's Blessing
support.description: Supports any Skill that can deal Damage, causing it to deal more Damage per different Command Skill used.

support.name: Verglas
support.description: Supports Skills you use yourself which can Hit Enemies. Supported Skills Gain a percentage of their Damage as Cold Damage when you destroy Ice Crystals.

support.name: Vilenta's Propulsion
support.description: Supports Spell Skills that fire Projectiles, causing increases and reductions to cast speed to also apply to Projectile speed.

support.name: Vitality I
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain Life Regeneration while the Skill is active.

support.name: Vitality II
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing you to gain Life Regeneration while the Skill is active.

support.name: Volatility
support.description: Supports Skills you use yourself which can cause Damaging Hits. Supported Skills grant Volatility on Critical Hit.

support.name: Volcanic Eruption
support.description: Supports Melee Strike Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills trigger Volcanic Eruption on Hit against Ignited Enemies.

support.name: Volt
support.description: Supports Projectile Attack Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills gain Voltaic Charge as you move, up to a maximum. When used, Supported Skills expend that Charge to gain extra Lightning Damage.

support.name: Warm Blooded
support.description: Supports Persistent Buff Skills, causing Freeze applied to you to last for a shorter duration while the Supported Skill is active.

support.name: Wildfire
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, Spreading Ignites it inflicts to nearby enemies after a delay.

support.name: Wildshards I
support.description: Supports Projectile Spells. Supported Spells have a chance to fire many additional Projectiles in a circle.

support.name: Wildshards II
support.description: Supports Projectile Spells. Supported Spells have a chance to fire many additional Projectiles in a circle.

support.name: Window of Opportunity I
support.description: Supports Channelling skills that have special effects if released with Perfect Timing, causing them to deal much more damage if released with Perfect Timing but reducing the Perfect Timing window.

support.name: Window of Opportunity II
support.description: Supports Channelling skills that have special effects if released with Perfect Timing, causing them to deal much more damage and grant Perfect Deflection if released with Perfect Timing but reducing the Perfect Timing window.

support.name: Withering Touch
support.description: Supports any skill that Hits enemies, giving it a chance to Wither enemies on Hit.

support.name: Xoph's Pyre
support.description: Supports Skills that can cause Damaging Hits, granting extra Chaos damage and causing Chaos damage to Contribute to Ignites.

support.name: Zarokh's Refrain
support.description: Supports Spells that affect an area around you or a target location. Supported Spells echo twice, causing their effects to happen again after a short delay, but Supported Skills are given a short Cooldown. Cannot support Channelling skills, Remote skills, skills which already have a Cooldown, or skills which are Triggered.

support.name: Zenith I
support.description: Supports Spell Skills. Supported Skills deal more damage while you are above 90% of your Maximum Mana. Does not modify Skills used by Minions.

support.name: Zenith II
support.description: Supports Spell Skills. Supported Skills deal more damage while you are above 90% of your Maximum Mana, and Recoup a portion of Skill costs as Mana. Does not modify Skills used by Minions.
